title: A Message in the Night
description: A dying Gorumite asks for help with his final breath; Iron Harbor is in danger.

title: Elder Ordwi Found
description: The party finds Elder Ordwi

title: Xar-Azmak Defeated
description: Party arrives in Dis, Hell

title: Blu's Birthday
description: A foundling raised by an order of monks, Blu's real birthdate is unknown. But on this day years ago, an Automaton delivered the child to the Order of the Platinum Band.

name: Longnight
description: All-night festival in which revelers defy the darkness of winter and stay up to greet the dawn.

title: Ritual of the Whip Sting
description: Calistrian day of vengeance. Any revenge taken on this day must be put fully to rest.

title: Feast of Vigor
description: A communal, hedonistic celebration of pleasure.

title: Merrymead
description: Merrymead was started by Druma's Caydenites, who had the brilliant idea to host a massive party to drink the remains of the previous year's alcohol in a symbolic act of drowning unfinished business.

title: Day of Bones
description: Priests and worshipers of the Lady of Graves parade the bodies of the recently dead on this holiday, holding free burials afterwards.

title: Firstbloom
description: Firstbloom is a holiday celebrating the first planting of the agricultural season, and generally associated with the weather god Gozreh. It falls on the vernal equinox.

title: Currentseve
description: A somber festival, it was started by sailors seeking the protection of Gozreh, deity of storms, to ensure safe voyages as the spring fishing ventures began their preparations.

name: Rememberance Moon
description: A comemorative holiday celebrating those that died in the Shining Crusades against the Whispering Tyrant.

title: Ascendance Night (Norgorber)
description: A holiday comemorating the apotheosis of the Reaper of Reputation.

title: Ritual of Stardust
description: Bi-annual festival held on the solstices, where the faithful of Desna sing songs through the night around bonfires.

title: Archerfeast
description: Devotees of Erastil celebrate this holiday with archery contests and a celebration of the contribution of Hunters to their communities.

title: First Brewing
description: Cayden's priests use this holiday to bless the year's harvest of brewing crops and reflect on the hard work of the Accidental God's devotees.

title: Day of the Inheritor
description: A holiday commemorating the church of Iomedae's adoption of the forlorn faithful of the dead god Aroden into their midst.

title: Swallowtail Festival
description: Priests of Desna release a wagon full of swallowtail butterflies in front of a crowd of believers. Worshipers consider it a good omen if a butterfly rests on him or her for a short time. The remainder of the day is spent in celebration and can include activities such as feasting, storytelling, and singing.

title: Feast of the Survivors
description: A Nidalese tradition celebrating the protection offered by Zon-Kuthon to their people for generations. Hyper-goth Passover.

title: Ascendance Day (Iomedae)
description: Holiday marking the ascension of the goddess Iomedae after taking the Test of the Starstone.

title: Jestercap
description: A gnomish holiday celebrated by playing practical jokes.

title: Allbrith
description: What was once a day of bloodcurdling ritualistic sacrifice has become a day of temptation and celebration, ever since the half-orcs and Goblins of Katapesh popularized the celebration of the Demon Queen Lamashtu with secretive masquerades.

title: Festival of the Witch
description: A tradition started in Irrisen, it is a celebration of all Witches and the refinement of their craft.

name: Festival of Making and Breaking
description: Artisans teach children to build something which, come evening, is then destroyed by teachers of magic in a vibrant elemental display.

title: Abjurant Day
description: Nethysian holiday devoted to magical protection and securing that which is dear to you.

title: Evoking Day
description: Holiday marked by displays of fireworks and magical duels (both mock and real).

title: Transmutatum
description: Holiday celebrating transformation, both magical and metaphysical.

title: Ascension Day (Cayden Cailean)
description: Celebration of the Accidental God's triumph over the Test of the Starstone.

title: Day of Order
description: Asmodean holiday recognizing Asmodeus slaying his brother Ihys at the dawn of this universe.

title: Candlemark
description: Holiday reminding the faithful that the Dawnflower's power to heal and redeem is always with her, even during the sun's weakest day. The day is also seen as a time to look forward to longer days.

title: Crystalhue
description: Shelynite holiday marked by the creation of artistic works, and the start of romantic courtships.

title: Ritual of Stardust
description: Bi-annual festival held on the solstices, where the faithful of Desna sing songs through the night around bonfires.

title: The Final Day
description: Cultists of Groetus perform an hour's silence at dusk on the last day of the year and seek guidance from their god about the End Time.

title: Night of the Pale
description: On the Night of the Pale, it is said that the ghosts of those who died during the previous year manifest upon the world and come to visit the homes they lived in during life. Although some might think that the chance of seeing even the shade of a dearly departed one might be a blessing, the Night of the Pale is not a time for tearful reunions, for these ghosts, tradition says, do not return out of love for those they left behind but out of darker compulsions.

title: Turning Day
description: The changing of the year is celebrated by Alseta's faithful with the forgiveness of old debts and grudges, and embracing new opportunities.
